name: B2 Capital
overview:
B2 Capital Management, LLC is a specialized alternative investment management company offering unique, proprietary investment solutions for high net worth individuals seeking annual returns which substantially outperform underlying indexes such as the S&P 500.

The initial offering from B2 Capital Management is the Genesis Cornerstone Fund – a hedge fund formed as a limited partnership with B2 Capital Management LLC acting as the general partner. This investment vehicle is reserved exclusively for accredited investors.

As the general partner, B2 Capital Management is responsible for the management of the fund’s assets and day‐to‐day activities of the fund which include trading, trade reconciliation, client relations and reporting of daily activity to the fund’s third‐party administrator.
